SMA Control Common.description: Dummy module containing control structures and registers for all products.

ENABLE_PWR_8WS.brief: Status of power output enabled/disabled for each wire

ENABLE_PWR_SIX_AXIS.brief: Status of power output enabled/disabled for each wire

ENABLE_PWR_2W.brief: Status of power output enabled/disabled for each wire

ENABLE_PWR_4WS.brief: Status of power output enabled/disabled for each wire

ENABLE_PWR_SMA_VS_SPRING.brief: Status of power output enabled/disabled for each wire

ENABLE_PWR_SESH.brief: Status of power output enabled/disabled for each wire

ENABLE_PWR_VRG.brief: Status of power output enabled/disabled for each wire

RDELTAERR_D.brief: Delta Resistance Error in dof space

RDELTAERR_W.brief: Delta Resistance Error in wire space

RDELTA_W.brief: Delta wire resistance in wire space

RDELTA_D.brief: Delta wire resistance in DOF space

RDELTADEMANDOUTPUT_D.brief: Delta resistance demands - output of DLA block

RDELTADEMANDOUTPUT_W.brief: Delta resistance demands - output of DLA block

PDELTA_PROP_D.brief: Power delta computed by proprtional feedback controller in dof space

PDELTA_INT_D.brief: Power delta computed by integral feedback controller in dof space

PDELTA_INT_W.brief: Power delta computed by integral feedback controller in wire space

PDELTA_DIFF_D.brief: Power delta computed by differential feedback controller in dof space

PDELTA_FEEDBACK_D.brief: Sum of all feedback paths power deltas in dof space

PDELTA_FEEDBACK_W.brief: Sum of all feedback paths power deltas in wire space

AF_OFFSET_DOWN.brief: Offset to apply to AF position when a wire in the down group's power is disabled

AF_OFFSET_UP.brief: Offset to apply to AF position when a wire in the up group's power is disabled

CTRL_FEATURES_8WS.brief: Bit field used to enable or disable some of the Control features.

CTRL_FEATURES_SIX_AXIS.brief: Bit field used to enable or disable some of the Control features.

CTRL_FEATURES_SESH.brief: Bit field used to enable or disable some of the Control features.

CTRL_FEATURES_4WS.brief: Bit field used to enable or disable some of the Control features.

CTRL_FEATURES_SMA_VS_SPRING.brief: Bit field used to enable or disable some of the Control features.

CTRL_FEATURES_2W.brief: Bit field used to enable or disable some of the Control features.

CTRL_FEATURES_VRG.brief: Bit field used to enable or disable some of the Control features.

CTRL_PROP_GAIN_D.brief: Proportional gain of the control loop in Q8.8 format

CTRL_PROP_GAIN_W.brief: Proportional gain of the control loop in Q8.8 format

CTRL_INTEGRAL_GAIN_D.brief: Integral gain of the control loop in Q8.8 format

CTRL_INTEGRAL_GAIN_W.brief: Integral gain of the control loop in Q8.8 format

CTRL_DIFFERENTIAL_GAIN_D.brief: Differential gain of the control loop in Q8.8 format

CTRL_DIFFERENTIAL_GAIN_W.brief: Differential gain of the control loop in Q8.8 format

CTRL_PRESSURE_ANGLE.brief: Pressure angle for sma motor, 512 = pi radians

POS_ADJ_D.brief: Input position adjustment values in position units

CTRL_FFP_PDELTA_D.brief: Linear Gain Module for FFP output, per DOF

CTRL_FFP_ENTHALPY_PDELTA_D.brief: Proportional Gain for Linear FFP Enthalpy Module, per DOF.

CTRL_FFP_GAIN.brief: Proportional signed gain of Linear Gain Module of the FF path

CTRL_FFP_GAIN_D.brief: Proportional signed gain of Linear Gain Module of the FF path per axis

CTRL_FFP_GAIN_W.brief: Proportional signed gain of Linear Gain Module of the FF path per axis

CTRL_FFP_ENTHALPY_GAIN.brief: Proportional gain of Linear Gain Module for FFP Enthalpy

CTRL_FFP_PDELTA_W.brief: Linear Gain Module for FFP output, per channel

CTRL_FFP_ENTHALPY_PDELTA_W.brief: Linear Gain Module for FFP Enthalpy output, per channel

XTALK_COMPENSATED_FEEDBACK_D.brief: The rdeltademand compensated for the feedback xtalk

XTALK_COMPENSATED_FEEDFORWARD_D.brief: The rdeltademand compensated for the feedforward xtalk

TG0_4WS_DRIVE_POS_ADJ.brief: The Z, RX and RY position adjust registers for running in 4w drive with tension group 0

TG1_4WS_DRIVE_POS_ADJ.brief: The Z, RX and RY position adjust registers for running in 4w drive with tension group 0

CTRL_PAD.brief: Padding to ensure that the ctrl structs are a multiple of 4 bytes.

READBACKS_RES_PAD.brief: Padding to ensure that the ctrl structs are a multiple of 4 bytes.

READBACKS_DUTY_PAD.brief: Padding to ensure that the ctrl structs are a multiple of 4 bytes.

CTRL_PROP_GAIN_PAD.brief: Padding to ensure that the ctrl structs are a multiple of 4 bytes.

SMASTATUS_SERVO_OFF.brief: Servo is off, actuator is idle

SMASTATUS_SSLDEBUG.brief: For power/duty control, no chain running

SMASTATUS_POWERUP.brief: For ZHP only, the actuator is being powered up

SMASTATUS_POWERDOWN.brief: For ZHP only, the actuator is being powered down

SMASTATUS_ZEROPOWER.brief: For ZHP only, the actuator is not powered
